original_title: 秘密捜査官の女 監禁飼育されたエージェント 麻美ゆま
overview: One day, with the appearance of data concerning foreign munitions industries smuggling weapons to terrorist organizations, a secretary to the Foreign Minister mysteriously vanishes... Special Investigator Yuma receives orders to retrieve the data and search for the missing secretary. Threatened with chillingly evil rape and torture... watch as she is degraded by repeated torture and rape and tearful screams of ecstasy!
title: Secret Woman Investigator: Confined Agent Breeding Yuma Asami
